Changelog
=========
0.4 (2013-02-21)
---------------------
- Changed field types to give more freedom to the born and died date.

0.3 (2013-01-16)
---------------------
- Showing related items widget.

0.2 (2012-10-10)
---------------------
- Renaming fields and removing typos

0.1dev (unreleased)
-------------------

- Initial release
